item.title: Revamp & Launch Creative Strategy for Enterprise SaaS (YouTube Creatives Needed) - Upwork
item.description:
We are a large enterprise urgently seeking a seasoned professional to lead a comprehensive creative strategy overhaul for our YouTube presence. This pivotal role involves revamping our current creative assets, conducting an in-depth review of our video content strategy, and developing robust A/B testing plans to align with our new marketing direction. The ideal candidate will possess years of experience managing and optimizing large-scale video campaigns and a proven track record in implementing successful creative transitions.

Your expertise will be crucial in driving our marketing direction forward, ensuring all video content is optimized for maximum engagement and performance. If you are a true professional with a deep understanding of video content creation, YouTube optimization, and A/B testing methodologies, we want to hear from you. Join us in this critical phase to shape the future of our marketing efforts.


Budget: $5,500
Posted On: June 17, 2024 23:10 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Brand Strategy, YouTube Ads, Google Ads, Marketing Strategy, Copywriting, Graphic Design, Social Media Marketing
Skills: Brand Strategy, YouTube Ads, Google Ads, Marketing Strategy, Copywriting, Graphic Design, Social Media Marketing
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Faceless Sports Documentary Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a full-service video editor for my MMA documentary youtube channel.

This project will be around 30 mins or less in length to be edited. I will provide suggested clips, images etc to be used for the majority of the video. You need to put them together creatively and enhance on the style of my editing.

I am not looking for crazy over the top TikTok/YT shorts style editing, these are long-form faceless documentaries.

My goal is to keep a similar style to my current videos as linked below, but of a higher quality with some more advanced editing techniques used.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T4O58ItXvu0&t=65s

Please include sample work with your submission, and you MUST be willing to do a short trial edit (of around 1 min) to be considered.

If we work well, there is potential for this to become a consistent gig and pay can scale upwards.

Thanks.

Budget: $350
Posted On: June 17, 2024 22:51 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Documentary, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Sports
Skills: Video Editing, Documentary, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Sports
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

item.title: Faceless Sports Youtube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and creative video editor to join our team and produce engaging faceless sports videos for our YouTube channel. The ideal candidate will be passionate about sports, possess strong editing skills, and have experience creating content that captivates and entertains viewers.

**Responsibilities:**

- Create 8-10 minute faceless sports videos featuring highlights, top lists, player profiles, analysis, and commentary.
- Use a variety of video clips, images, and graphics to craft visually appealing content.
- Edit videos to ensure smooth transitions, clear audio, and high-quality visuals.
- Incorporate background music, sound effects, and voiceovers as needed.
- Research and gather content to ensure videos are accurate, up-to-date, and relevant.
- Collaborate with the team to develop new video ideas and concepts.

**Requirements:**

- Proven experience in video editing and production.
- Proficiency with video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
- Strong understanding of sports, including current events and popular trends.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
- Creative mindset with an eye for detail and quality.
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

- Experience creating content for YouTube or other social media platforms.
- Knowledge of YouTube SEO and best practices for video creation.
- Ability to create compelling thumbnails and titles.

If you are a sports enthusiast with a knack for video editing and a desire to create exciting, faceless sports content, we would love to hear from you! Please provide examples of your previous work when applying.

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 17, 2024 22:50 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Development, YouTube, YouTube Marketing, Sports & Recreation, Video Production, Video Editing
Skills: YouTube Development, YouTube, YouTube Marketing, Sports & Recreation, Video Production, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Case Study Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video storyteller to help us turn around three 2-minute video case studies for our marketing agency. YOU MUST BE AN EXCELLENT STORYTELLER IN THE MEDIUM OF VIDEO!  We will need to use a mix of canned video and shots that we pull since we don't have much actual video. We have scripts written and much of the content ready. The ideal candidate should have strong video editing skills and be able to work efficiently under tight deadlines. Attention to detail and creativity are essential.

- Video editing
  
- Attention to detail
  
- Creativity

item.title: Podcast Editor - Simple Editing - Upwork
item.description:
Hiring a video editor to edit podcasts.

The candidate should have good knowledge of video editing and podcast editing. We only need 4-5 podcasts edited per month, and we are looking for simple editing.

The software we are using is Adobe Premiere Pro. There are no fixed working hours; we just need the projects delivered on time. A good PC with decent RAM is required since our video sizes are large, around 1 hour+ for each episode with 3 camera's and 1 audio. We will provide the outro and intro.

Pay is $200 per month for this freelance gig.

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 17, 2024 22:47 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Podcast, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Podcast, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: India

join the videos up so they blend into each other and create a good flow between nice and funny)
ensure audio levels are at a consistent level

Then clips should be short and punchy, long clips can also be split up a little

I have 10-15

item.title: Seeking Skilled Video Editor for TikTok/Reels - Long-term Collaboration - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am looking for a talented video editor to assist with creating engaging TikTok and Reels videos. Please provide a portfolio when you respond to this posting.

To move forward, I would like to get more details regarding your rates. Could you please provide information on:

Your monthly rate for a specified number of TikTok/Reels videos (please indicate the number of videos included).
Your rate per individual video.
Additionally, could you share any relevant experience or examples of similar projects you have worked on in the past?

I am looking for a long-term collaboration with someone who is ready to support me continuously.

Please contact me with your portfolio so we can discuss the details.

Best regards,

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00

item.title: Video Producer - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking to produce four 1 - 2 minutes long videos, plus a few other shorter videos. The videos target children 5 - 8 years old and their parents.

The hired freelancer will be given the purpose of each video and our brand guidelines. He/she needs to drive the entire process of ideation, scripting, and production. Therefore, in addition to video production skills, the candidate needs to possess other skills such as storytelling, creativity, and project management.

Ideal candidates should also have experience producing videos targeted towards young children.

item.title: Urgently Needed Graphic Designer and Video Editor! - Upwork
item.description:
Company: Beneloyal Health

Company Overview:
BeneLoyal Health is a forward thinking health benefits consulting company dedicated to providing innovative health solutions to our diverse clientele. We specialize in creating seamless, user-friendly digital experiences that enhance patient care and engagement. Our commitment to leveraging technology to improve health outcomes sets us apart as a leader in the healthcare sector.

Job Description:
Beneloyal Health seeks a talented and experienced Graphic Designer and Video Editor with a strong creative touch to join our vibrant team. The ideal candidate will be crucial in producing and designing content for our marketing initiatives.

Job Responsibilities:
• Create visually compelling graphics for digital and print media, including social media posts, brochures, and advertisements.
• Design and edit video content for marketing campaigns, social media, and internal communications.
• Collaborate with the marketing team to develop and execute creative concepts and campaigns.
• Manage multiple design projects simultaneously, ensuring timely delivery of high-quality work.
• Maintain brand consistency across all visual materials.
• Stay updated on the latest design trends and tools to keep the company’s visual content innovative and engaging.

Requirements and Qualifications:
• Proven experience as a Graphic Designer and Video Editor, with a strong portfolio showcasing your skills.
• Proficiency in graphic design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign).
• Expertise in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects.
• Strong understanding of typography, color theory, and layout design.
• Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
• Ability to work independently and manage time effectively in a fast-paced environment.
• Attention to detail and a keen eye for aesthetics.
• Degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, or related field is preferred but not required.
• Experience in the healthcare industry is a plus but not mandatory.

Beneloyal Health is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.


Hourly Range: $9.00-$12.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 22:16 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Illustrator, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Photo Editing
Skills: Adobe Illustrator, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Photo Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for long-term project - Upwork
item.description:
I'm going to launch a long-term video content project for my both brands Amchara and Swandoola.

For Amchara the focus is on home detox, how can one detox at home, what's needed, advice etc. The monetisation will be consultations with me, purchasing of functional tests and potentailly online courses/programmes

For Swandoola the content is business coaching for nutritionists, Doctors and other health clinic professionals who want to build their business and ironically this includes creating online content too. So part of my first business model is to show nutritionists how I do it.

I'm looking for a long-term relationship with a video editing professional who might also be able to bring general marketing value though that is a different skill so might. be best suited to a separate person

I'm looking to start this project in July. I look forward to meeting with you

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 22:12 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply
